docs.snippet: A vigilante leader in a Mexican state torn by violence said on Wednesday it would be better to kill the heads of the region's dominant drug cartel than arrest them, and rejected a government order to disarm....
docs.lead_paragraph: A vigilante leader in a Mexican state torn by violence said on Wednesday it would be better to kill the heads of the region's dominant drug cartel than arrest them, and rejected a government order to disarm.

headline.main: Mexico Vigilante Leader Wants Cartel Bosses Dead, Not Captured
headline.print_headline: Mexico Vigilante Leader Wants Cartel Bosses Dead, Not Captured

docs.snippet: People with severe head injuries like the one that left Michael Schumacher in critical condition have permanently altered brains that make the victims more likely to become mentally ill and die prematurely, scientists said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: People with severe head injuries like the one that left Michael Schumacher in critical condition have permanently altered brains that make the victims more likely to become mentally ill and die prematurely, scientists said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Brain Injuries Like Schumacher's Can Destroy Lives: Study
headline.print_headline: Brain Injuries Like Schumacher's Can Destroy Lives: Study

docs.snippet: Gov. Chris Christie, whose aides and appointees apparently engineered a traffic nightmare as political payback, sought to change the subject in his State of the State speech....
docs.lead_paragraph: Gov. Chris Christie, whose aides and appointees apparently engineered a traffic nightmare as political payback, sought to change the subject in his State of the State speech.
docs.abstract: New Jersey Gov Chris Christie scrambles to regain his political footing and delivers a high-stakes State of the State address; speech mixes expressions of contrition, defiant assertion that his troubles are no excuse for inaction and a demand for bipartisanship; still there is little sign that his administration’s widening scandal over lane closings at the George Washington Bridge is abating

headline.main: No Bluster as Christie Moves From Scandal to His Agenda
headline.print_headline: No Bluster as Christie Moves From Scandal to His Agenda

byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO and MARC SANTORA

docs.snippet: Behind the facade of pristine ski slopes, craft beer, quaint village greens and one of the lowest unemployment rates in the country, Vermont is grappling with painkiller and heroin abuse, a challenge leaders say is fueling crime and wrecking lives...
docs.lead_paragraph: Behind the facade of pristine ski slopes, craft beer, quaint village greens and one of the lowest unemployment rates in the country, Vermont is grappling with painkiller and heroin abuse, a challenge leaders say is fueling crime and wrecking lives and families disproportionately in this tiny state.

headline.main: Heroin and Pill Abuse Stir a Battle Cry in Vermont
headline.print_headline: Heroin and Pill Abuse Stir a Battle Cry in Vermont
